Line1.B20BA: Torn throat? Hmm… Too clean for a beast. Messy for a man.
Line11.B20BA: Not normal to miss their mid-way pint. Something’s wrong…
Line3.B79B1: It’s the Bear of Blackweald! (hic) Returned from the Days of Ash to silence us all!
Line5.B79B1: Tore out their throats, he did. Women. Children. Any who faced the man were left wheezing blood!
Line9.B20BA: But something has eyes for our merchants. Others have yet to arrive from the eastern road.
